DAY1.Breakfast: 1/2 cup oats cooked in 1/2 cup each 2% milk and water,1 medium plum, chopped,4 walnut halves, chopped,Top oats with plum and walnuts.
DAY1.Snacks: 3/4 cup blueberries, Top blueberries with yogurt.
DAY1.Lunch: 2 slices whole-wheat bread,2 tsp. whole-grain mustard, divided1/2 medium apple, sliced, 2 oz. low-sodium deli turkey, 2 Tbsp. shredded Cheddar cheese, divided,1 cup mixed greens
DAY1.Dinner: 2 1/2 cups Vegetable Weight-Loss Soup, 1 serving Rosemary-Goat Cheese Toast,Make Ahead Tip: Save 1 3/4 cups soup for lunch on Day 2, and another 2 cups for lunch on Day 6.

DAY2.Breakfast: (384 calories) 1/2 cup oats cooked in 1/2 cup each 2% milk and water,1 medium plum, chopped,4 walnut halves, chopped,Top oats with plum and walnuts.
DAY2.Snacks: (194 calories) 3/4 cup blueberries, Top blueberries with yogurt,1/2 medium apple
DAY2.Lunch: (319 calories) 2 slices whole-wheat bread,2 tsp. whole-grain mustard, divided1/2 medium apple, sliced, 2 oz. low-sodium deli turkey, 2 Tbsp. shredded Cheddar cheese, divided,1 cup mixed greens
DAY2.Dinner: (497 calories) 2 serving Rosemary-Goat Cheese Toast,Make Ahead Tip,2 1/4 cups Vegetable Weight-Loss Soup, Save 1 3/4 cups soup for lunch on Day 2, and another 2 cups for lunch on Day 6.

DAY3.Breakfast: 2 large eggs, cooked in 1/4 tsp. olive oil or coat pan with a thin layer of cooking spray (1-second spray). Season with a pinch each of salt and pepper, 2 1/2 Tbsp. unsalted dry-roasted almonds,1 Tbsp.pico de gallo or salsa,Top tortillas with avocado, eggs and salsa.
DAY3.Snacks: 3/4 cup blueberries, Top blueberries with yogurt.
DAY3.Lunch: (319 calories, 37 g carbohydrates) 2 slices whole-wheat bread,2 tsp. whole-grain mustard, divided1/2 medium apple, sliced, 2 oz. low-sodium deli turkey, 2 Tbsp. shredded Cheddar cheese, divided,1 cup mixed greens
DAY3.Dinner: (417 calories, 54 g carbohydrates) 2 1/2 cups Vegetable Weight-Loss Soup, 1 serving Rosemary-Goat Cheese Toast,Make Ahead Tip: Save 1 3/4 cups soup for lunch on Day 2, and another 2 cups for lunch on Day 6.

DAY4.Breakfast: 1 cup rolled oats cooked in 1 cup milk and 1 cup water, 1 cup sliced strawberries,Cook oats and top with strawberries and a pinch of cinnamon.
DAY4.Snacks: 1/2 medium apple, sliced, 1/2 tsp. honey, Pinch of cinnamon,Drizzle the apple slices with honey and sprinkle with cinnamon.
DAY4.Lunch: Veggie - Hummus Sandwich• 2 slices whole - grain bread• 2 1 / 2 Tbsp.hummus• 1 / 2 avocado,mashed• 1 / 4 cup cucumber slices• 1 / 4 medium red bell pepper,sliced• 1 / 3 cup shredded carrots, 1 cup mixed greens,Spread bread with hummus and avocado and layer on vegetables,1 medium apple
DAY4.Dinner: 2 1/2 cups Vegetable Weight-Loss Soup, 1 serving Rosemary-Goat Cheese Toast

DAY5.Breakfast: 1 serving Egg Toast and 1 cup milk and 1 cup water
DAY5.Snacks: Drizzle the apple slices with honey and sprinkle with cinnamon.
DAY5.Lunch: 3/4 cup canned black beans, rinsed 1/2 medium bell pepper, sliced,3 Tbsp. shredded cheddar cheese
DAY5.Dinner: 1 1/4 cups Chicken Cauliflower Fried Rice, 3 cups mixed greens, 1/2 cup cucumber slices

DAY6.Breakfast: 2-3 eggs + 2 toast + 1 bowl of full milk with cereal OR a bowl oats/poridge OR stuffed parathas
DAY6.Snacks: 1 fruit + yoghurt can add granola + nuts OR fruit juice OR smoothie
DAY6.Lunch: (319 calories, 37 g carbohydrates) 2 slices whole-wheat bread,2 tsp. whole-grain mustard, divided1/2 medium apple, sliced, 2 oz. low-sodium deli turkey, 2 Tbsp. shredded Cheddar cheese, divided,1 cup mixed greens
DAY6.Dinner: 2 1/2 cups Vegetable Weight-Loss Soup, 1 serving Rosemary-Goat Cheese Toast

DAY7.Breakfast: ½ cooked chicken breast,1 hard-boiled egg, ¼ tbsp. fat-free mayo,¼ tbsp. curry powder,½ Ezekiel muffin (or other high-protein bread),Basil or chives (optional)-Dash salt
DAY7.Lunch: 1 8-inch low carb flour tortill,2 oz. (55g) smoked salmon,2 tsp. low-fat cream cheese,1¼ oz. (35g) red onion,Handful arugula,½ tsp. fresh or dried basil,Pinch of pepper
DAY7.Dinner: 2 1/4 cups cooked brown rice,1 serving Cod with Tomato Cream Sauce,2 cups mixed greens topped with 1 Tbsp. each olive oil and balsamic vinegar.

DAY8.Breakfast: 4 oz. (112 g) low fat cottage cheese (about 1/2 cup),⅛ tsp. vanilla extract,Dash of cinnamon,4 drops liquid stevia,2.6 oz. (75 g) blackberries,0.8 oz. (23 g) almonds
DAY8.Lunch: 1 chicken breast,1 oz. (28 g) low-fat mozzarella,1 artichoke heart (from a can),1 tsp. sundried tomato, chopped,5 large basil leaves,1 clove garlic,¼ tsp. curry powder,¼ tsp. paprika,Pinch of pepper,2 oz. (57 g) sweet potato
DAY8.Dinner: 2 cups mixed greens topped with 1 Tbsp. each olive oil and balsamic vinegar.

DAY9.Lunch: 1 1/4 cups Chicken Cauliflower Fried Rice, 3 cups mixed greens,3/4 cup sliced cucumber,Combine salad ingredients and top with 1 Tbsp. each balsamic vinegar and olive oil.
DAY9.Snacks: 3 Tbsp. unsalted dry-roasted almonds,2 medium carrots
DAY9.Dinner: Toaster-Oven Tostada, 3 corn tortillas,1/2 cup canned black beans,  2 Tbsp. shredded Cheddar cheese, 1/2 avocado, diced, 2 Tbsp. salsa or pico de gallo,Top tortillas with beans and cheese. Toast until the cheese begins to melt. Top with avocado and salsa, 2 cups mixed greens, topped with 1 Tbsp. each lime juice and 2 tsp. olive oil.

Day 10.Snacks: 2 multigrain rice cake,2 Tbsp. peanut butter, 2 cup sliced cucumber

Day 10.Dinner: 2 1/4 cups cooked brown rice,1 serving Cod with Tomato Cream Sauce,2 cups mixed greens topped with 1 Tbsp. each olive oil and balsamic vinegar.

DAY11.Dinner: 1 cup steamed green beans, 1 baked large red potato, 1 serving Seared Salmon with Green Peppercorn Sauce,drizzled with 2 tsp. olive oil, 1/4 tsp. garlic powder and a pinch of pepper.
